articles.description: High valuations are due to contraction of economy at a time when markets made robust gains.India’s real GDP shrank by a record 7.3% in FY21, marking the first annual decline since 1980-81
articles.content:
MUMBAI :
Indias market capitalization to gross domestic product (GDP) surged to a decadal-high of 103.47% as of 31 March, signalling expensive valuation of equities but most likely pricing in a reco… [+4187 chars]

articles.title: Despite weak Q4, forward prospects look strong for Aurobindo Pharma - Mint

articles.content: Aurobindo Pharma Ltds March quarter results were slightly lower than expectations. This was primarily on account of a soft performance in Europe and some growth markets. The spread of covid in these … [+2785 chars]

articles.description: Nagaraj Shetti of HDFC Securities feels the next upside levels to be watched for Nifty is 15,800 levels, which could be reached in the next 3-4 sessions.

articles.description: The companys board approved a final dividend off Rs. 5.75 per share for the financial year ended March 2021.
articles.content:
